txt.en:
'When we are prepared, the path my people must take to Dunharrow is through the Harrowdale. I have sent several of my men through the valley already, and they work even now to ensure that a suitable camp is prepared for those who travel to Dunharrow.

'Ellen Fremedon holds Underharrow along our path, and I have already sent word to ready supplies and beds for our passing. She is not fond of me, of this I am sure, but I cannot help but make demands in such dire times.

'If you would aid her, perhaps that will assuage some of her frustration and allow us to depart sooner.'
Talk to Ellen Fremedon in Underharrow
Éowyn seeks to ready her people to travel south to Dunharrow, but the path through the Harrowdale must be prepared before their travels can begin.
'Ah, so Éowyn believes it enough aid to send you here...how thoughtful of her.\n\n'As the warriors and my husband are away, if you wish to be put to work, I have no shortage of it for you.'

Ellen Fremedon can be found outside the Mead Hall of Underharrow in the Harrowdale.\n\nÉowyn has asked that you aid Ellen Fremedon in preparing for the people of Kingstead as they journey to Dunharrow.
